import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { useTranslation, withTranslation } from "react-i18next" import { formatCurrency, translationHelpers } from '../../../../helpers'; import * as url from "../../../../helpers/url_helper" import Breadcrumbs from "../../../../components/Common/Breadcrumb" import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { Row, Col, Button, Label, Input, Modal, Card, CardBody, CardFooter, InputGroup, CardHeader, Table, } from "reactstrap" import { AvForm, AvField, AvGroup } from "availity-reactstrap-validation" import { BackendServices, CoreServices } from "../../../../services"; import { useHistory, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import LoadingOverlay from "react-loading-overlay"; import Currency from "../../../../helpers/currency"; import { uniq_key } from '../../../../helpers/unq_key' import moment from "moment"; import DatosServicioFiduciario from "./DatosServicioFiduciario"; import DatosOtrosDatos from "./DatosOtrosDatos"; import previewEscrow from './preview.model' import { Form } from "react-bootstrap"; import HeaderSections from "../../../../components/Common/HeaderSections"; const PrevisualizarFideicomiso = (props) => { const currencyData = new Currency(); const [t] = translationHelpers('translation'); const location = useLocation() const [datosUsuario, setdatosUsuario] = useState(null) const api = new BackendServices(); const history = useHistory(); const [locationData, setLocationData] = useState(null); const [ServiciosFiduciario, setServiciosFiduciario] = useState(null); const [OtherServiciosFiduciario, setOtherServiciosFiduciario] = useState(null); const [preview, setPreview] = useState(null); const [levelAutonomy, setLevelAutonomy] = useState(0); const [levelAutonomyPosition, setLevelAutonomyPosition] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { initialData(); }, []); useEffect(() => { console.log(levelAutonomy) saveAutonomy(); }, [levelAutonomy]) async function initialData() { let dataSession = { transactionId: atob(location?.pathname?.split("PrevisualizarFideicomiso/")[1]) }; let preview = new previewEscrow(dataSession) preview.validateRoute && history.push(url.URL_DASHBOARD); setPreview(preview); setServiciosFiduciario(await preview.LoadFiduciario()); setOtherServiciosFiduciario(await preview.LoadOtherFiduciario()) setLevelAutonomy(await preview.getFacilityHistory()) } async function saveAutonomy() { preview && setLevelAutonomyPosition(await preview.saveAutonomy(levelAutonomy)) } return ( <> {
{/* Previsualizacion de datos generales pantalla 1 */}
{t("Fiduciary Services Proposal")}
{t("Escrownumber")}:{" "}{preview?.basaFid ?? ''}
 {t("Tramit number")} {t("Customer ID")} {t("Revision Type")} {t("Pre Approved")} {t("Request")} {t("Economic Group Number")} {t("Economic Group Name")} {t("CountryClass")} {t("Last Application Date")} {t("CompanyActivity")} {t("RiskAssesment")} {t("SIB Minimum Provision")} {t("Next Revision Date")} {t("RelatedPart")} {t("ApprovalLevel")} {t("Proposal Expiration Date")} {t("AccountExecutive")} {t("ResponsibleUnit")} {t("Country Risk")} {t("Flow Type")} {t("Banking")} {t("FacilityType")} {/* {t("ExposureValue")} */} {t("ProposalType")}
{ServiciosFiduciario && } {OtherServiciosFiduciario && }
} ); }; PrevisualizarFideicomiso.propTypes = { isOpen: PropTypes.bool, toggle: PropTypes.func }; export default PrevisualizarFideicomiso;
